References

Applying and Extending Oracle Spatial

Background

I've just bought Applying and Extending Oracle Spatial by Simon Greener who is a tad of a hero. This post is a collection of notes on the section covering data import (Extract, Transform, Load (ETL)) using open source tools. Specifically Geokettle and GDAL/OGR.
